org.jcatapult.mvc.message
Interface MessageStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMessageStore
public interface MessageStore

This interface defines the mechanism by which errors are added and fetched.

Author:
Brian Pontarelli

Method Summary
 void addActionError(MessageScope scope, String key, Object... values)
          Adds an action error, which is pulled from the MessageProvider.The uri used to look up the message is the current request URI.

Method Detail

addConversionError

void addConversionError(String field,
                        String uri,
                        Map<String,String> dynamicAttributes,
                        Object... values)
                        throws org.jcatapult.l10n.MissingMessageException
Usually called by the ParameterWorkflow, this method adds a conversion error for the given parameter. The values can be token replaced within the localized error message.

Parameters:
field - The name of the field that the conversion error failed for.
uri - The URI (path) that is used to locate the bundle to pull the error from.
dynamicAttributes - The dynamic attributes, which might be useful for error messaging stuff.
values - The values attempting to be set into the field.
Throws:
org.jcatapult.l10n.MissingMessageException - If the conversion message is missing.

addFieldMessage

void addFieldMessage(MessageScope scope,
                     String field,
                     String bundle,
                     String key,
                     Object... values)
                     throws org.jcatapult.l10n.MissingMessageException
Adds a field message, which is pulled from the MessageProvider.

Parameters:
scope - The scope that the message should be placed into.
field - The field that the message is associated with.
bundle - The bundle the message should be pulled from.
key - The key in the bundle.
values - The values used to format the message.
Throws:
org.jcatapult.l10n.MissingMessageException - If the message is missing.

addFieldMessage

void addFieldMessage(MessageScope scope,
                     String field,
                     String key,
                     Object... values)
                     throws org.jcatapult.l10n.MissingMessageException
Adds a field message, which is pulled from the MessageProvider. The uri used to look up the message is the current request URI.

Parameters:
scope - The scope that the message should be placed into.
field - The field that the message is associated with.
key - The key in the bundle.
values - The values used to format the message.
Throws:
org.jcatapult.l10n.MissingMessageException - If the message is missing.

getActionMessages

List<String> getActionMessages(MessageType type)
Fetches all of the action messages that are currently available. Not mutable.

Parameters:
type - The message type to fetch (error or plain messages).
Returns:
The List of action messages and never null.

getActionMessages

List<String> getActionMessages()
Fetches all of the plain action messages that are currently available. Not mutable.

Returns:
The List of action messages and never null.

getActionErrors

List<String> getActionErrors()
Fetches all of the action errors that are currently available. Not mutable.

Returns:
The List of action messages and never null.

getFieldMessages

Map<String,List<String>> getFieldMessages(MessageType type)
Fetches all of the field messages that are currently available. Not mutable.

Parameters:
type - The message type to fetch (error or plain messages).
Returns:
The Map of field messages and never null.

getFieldMessages

Map<String,List<String>> getFieldMessages()
Fetches all of the plain field messages that are currently available. Not mutable.

Returns:
The Map of field messages and never null.

getFieldErrors

Map<String,List<String>> getFieldErrors()
Fetches all of the field errors that are currently available. Not mutable.

Returns:
The Map of field messages and never null.

clearActionMessages

void clearActionMessages(MessageType type)
Clears all of the action messages in all scopes of the given type.

Parameters:
type - The type of messages to clear (error or plain messages).

clearFieldMessages

void clearFieldMessages(MessageType type)
Clears all of the field messages in all scopes of the given type.

Parameters:
type - The type of messages to clear (error or plain messages).

contains

boolean contains(MessageType type)
Parameters:
type - The message type.
Returns:
True if the message store contains messages of the given type, false otherwise.
